definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: only in [[אָז לָåֶחם שְׁעָרִים]] Ju Jdg 5:8 (so Mass.; Codd. [[לָåֵחם]], [[לָåחֶם]]), usu. tr. then was there war of ( = at) the gates, but improb.; text and meaning dub.; A LXXL rd. is w(v a)/rton kri/qinon, whence Bu:RS 103 [[אָז לֶחֶם שְׂעׂרִים]] then they used to eat barley bread; but Bu:Comm. ´[[שׂ]] ´[[אָזַל ל]] the barley bread was exhausted; Mayer Lambert:RÉJ xxx, 115 [[אז לחמשׁ ערים]] then for (in) 5 citiesno shield was seen, etc.; other conj. in Kau:AT; cf. GFM:ad loc.
